isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 5000i, 9100i, 9200i, 9400i, 9900i MODELS - Starting 03/01/1999 - OPERATION - HEATING

svcsubproc.title: Cab
svcsubproc.para: With the A/C switch in the OFF position, heating is controlled with the temperature knob ( Figure 2). The full clockwise position provides the maximum heat. Move the mode control knob to obtain the desired air flow distribution between cab heat and defrost requirements. For the maximum air flow, set the fan control to the 4 position.

svcsubproc.title: Sleeper Compartment
svcsubproc.para: With the A/C switch in the OFF position, heating is controlled with the temperature and blower speed knobs. Full clockwise blower position and full clockwise temperature control position provide maximum heat ( Figure 3).
